title: Trump defends Saudi prince over journalist Khashoggi's murder
subhead: During the Saudi royal's visit to the White House – his first time in the US since the killing of Jamal Khashoggi in 2018 – Trump shielded him from journalists' questions. The White House later announced that the US and Saudi Arabia signed agreements on civil nuclear energy and the sale of US F-35 warplanes.

title: After exile, a Syrian family feels the call of their homeland
subhead: After living in Lebanon for 10 years, Fodda and Walid El-Youssef returned in October with their five children to the hamlet they had been forced to abandon during the civil war. As farmers with expertise in agroecology, they aim to help rebuild agriculture and sow the seeds for Syria's future.
